mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_read_history (user_id, comic_id, chapter_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{comicId}, #{chapterId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_read_history WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY read_time DESC

SELECT h.id as historyId, c.id as comicId, c.title as comicTitle, c.cover, ch.title as chapterTitle, h.read_time as readTime FROM t_read_history h
INNER JOIN t_comic c ON h.comic_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_chapter ch ON h.chapter_id = ch.id WHERE h.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY h.read_time DESC
